title: Paper Mario is Back! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.14.20
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about the return of Paper Mario with Paper Mario: The Origami King. 
 
Time Stamps - 
 00:02:00 - Housekeeping
We’re reacting to the Ghost of Tsushima State of Play. That’s happening today at 1pm pt on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Black Jack, Al Tribesman
The Roper Report   -
00:03:30 - Paper Mario is BACK - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
0015:10: - I understand that no one will ever EVER understand Nintendo but why a tweet? - Best Friends Q:Frankfurtter
00:25:25 - Vince Zampella says Titanfall is not in development - Ryan Mcaffrey @ IGN
00:33:15 - Ubisoft has some big things planned - Rebekah valentine @ GiBiz
00:40:30 - EVO’s 2020 lineup has been revealed with a notable game missing - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:46:20 - Scavengers Studio ends active development on Darwin Project - Alissa McAloon @ Gamasutra
00::48 20- A Greg Joint: Fallout 76 has announced a 2020 Roadmap - Email Press release
00:54:00 - Out today
00:55:45 -  HIMS
 Reader mail   -
00:57:20 - How badly will this affect next gen console sales? - Nick M
01:05:10 - Squad Up:Scannerz(Xbox) - Peregrine1313
01:05:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Blessing
